EmailTemplate.name: Global English - Danisco Logo One Time Use Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Approved – DuPont™ Danisco® Power Brand Logo Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Your request for a DuPont™ Danisco® Power brand logo has been approved. Please be aware that this approval is limited only to the use of the DuPont™ Danisco® Power brand logo specifically described in your request.
Attached to this note is a Power brand in various formats.
Copyright © 2015 DuPont or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved. The DuPont Oval Logo, DuPont™, Danisco®, and all products denoted with ® or ™ are registered trademarks or trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its affiliated companies.
If you need anything further, please let me know.
Jennifer McNaughton Global Communications DuPont Nutrition & Health +1 913 738 3604 jennifer.mcnaughton@dupont.com
